ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] April Fools
ygData.msgSnippet: I d be willing to bet that they actually just forgot bards and shamans.  No joke there *sighs* ... From: Kenneth E. Bachman To: eqbards@onelist.com Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
I'd be willing to bet that they actually just forgot bards and shamans. No joke there *sighs*
----- Original Message -----
From: Kenneth E. Bachman
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, April 02, 2000 2:07 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] April Fools


Firehawk wrote:

> I really wanted to believe that leaving the bard out was part of the joke..
> Saddly I really just can't.

Hehe. They forgot Shamans, too. Heck, I was trying to figure out what other class they missed, and *I*
forgot Shamans. And I *have* one!

Kenross Cantoforjado, 47 songs, Innoruuk
